alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 1:55PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Flagler, southeastern St. Johns, southeastern Marion and southeastern Putnam Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 155 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from near Crescent Beach to Weirsdale. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Bunnell, Crescent City, Andalusia, Juniper Springs, Marineland, Weirsdale, The Village of Briar Meadow, Ocklawaha and Moss Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns
